## PagingInitializer interface

Initializer that is used for initialization of paging

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PagingInitializer extends GridPlugin 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getItemsPerPage()](./grid.paginginitializer.getitemsperpage.md) | Gets initial items per page |
|  [getPage()](./grid.paginginitializer.getpage.md) | Gets initial page |
|  [setItemsPerPage(itemsPerPage)](./grid.paginginitializer.setitemsperpage.md) | Sets current items per page when changed |
|  [setPage(page)](./grid.paginginitializer.setpage.md) | Sets current page when changed |
